15 bool GridProcessing::checkConnectivity(double x0, double y0, double x1, double y1)
16 {
17  x0/=static_cast<double>(resolution_);
18  y0/=static_cast<double>(resolution_);
19  x1/=static_cast<double>(resolution_);
20  y1/=static_cast<double>(resolution_);
21 
22  x0+=xCentre_;
23  y0+=yCentre_;
24  x1+=xCentre_;
25  y1+=yCentre_;
26 
27 // std::cout << "[x0,y0,x1,y1][w,h]=[" << x0 << "," << y0 << "," <<
28 // x1 << "," << y1 << "] [" <<
29 // width_ << "," << height_ << "]" << std::endl;
30 
31  //Let's check the points to be searched are not outside the gridmap
32  if((x0<0)||(x0>width_)||(y0<0)||(y0>height_)){
33  return false;
34  }
35  if((x1<0)||(x1>width_)||(y1<0)||(y1>height_)){
36  return false;
37  }
38 
39  double dx = fabs(x1 - x0);
40  double dy = fabs(y1 - y0);
41 
42  int x = int(floor(x0));
43  int y = int(floor(y0));
44 
45  int n = 1;
46  int x_inc, y_inc;
47  double error;
48 
49  if (isEqual(dx,0))
50  {
51  x_inc = 0;
52  error = std::numeric_limits<double>::infinity();
53  }
54  else if (x1 > x0)
55  {
56  x_inc = 1;
57  n += int(floor(x1)) - x;
58  error = (floor(x0) + 1 - x0) * dy;
59  }
60  else
61  {
62  x_inc = -1;
63  n += x - int(floor(x1));
64  error = (x0 - floor(x0)) * dy;
65  }
66 
67  if (isEqual(dy,0))
68  {
69  y_inc = 0;
70  error -= std::numeric_limits<double>::infinity();
71  }
72  else if (y1 > y0)
73  {
74  y_inc = 1;
75  n += int(floor(y1)) - y;
76  error -= (floor(y0) + 1 - y0) * dx;
77  }
78  else
79  {
80  y_inc = -1;
81  n += y - int(floor(y1));
82  error -= (y0 - floor(y0)) * dx;
83  }
84 
85  for (; n > 0; --n)
86  {
87  if(!testCell(x,y)){
88  return false;//Let's break immediately here, search no longer required
89  }
90 
91  if (error > 0)
92  {
93  y += y_inc;
94  error -= dx;
95  }
96  else
97  {
98  x += x_inc;
99  error += dy;
100  }
101  }
102 
103  return true;
104 }
105 
106 bool GridProcessing::testCell(int x, int y){
107 
108  unsigned int index = y * width_ + x; //Is a row major
109 // std::cout << "[x,y,index,val]=[" << x << "," << y << "," <<
110 // index << "," <<
111 // static_cast<int>(grid_.data.at(index)) << "]" << std::endl;
112  if(grid_.data.at(index)<0){
113  return false;
114  }
115  return (grid_.data.at(index)<10)?true:false;
116 }

119 bool GridProcessing::checkConnectivity(geometry_msgs::Point origin, geometry_msgs::Point destination)
120 {
121  return checkConnectivity(origin.x, origin.y, destination.x, destination.y);
122 }

124 void GridProcessing::setGrid(nav_msgs::OccupancyGrid grid){
125  grid_ = grid;
126  xCentre_=grid.info.width/2;
127  yCentre_=grid.info.height/2;
128  width_=grid.info.width;
129  height_=grid.info.height;
130  resolution_=grid.info.resolution;
131  return;
132 }
